JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Responsibilities    Design and Develop iOS platform from the ground and work with the Team to develop APIs     Develop iOS application interface, working closely with interface designers contribute ideas, describe platform limitations     Provide leadership in the application design, architecture and development     Optimize iOS/ server messaging and communication     Work closely with server- side development team to define new features and capabilities of the platform     Stay abreast of latest iOS platform features and propose evolution of application to take advantage of the same     Optimize interface for rendering on multiple devices     Drive and participate in code reviews, test plan reviews, and documentation reviews   Participate and lead team meetings to help improve development processes    Requirements    Strong experience (7 years) with iOS application development     Cocoa Touch, iOS SDK, xTool, Xcode knowledge     Has deployed applications in the Apple iPhone App Store     Heavy experience with Objective- C/ C with Cocoa and other frameworks
